content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Production Line
Consists of three stone furnaces in a row:
- Furnace 1 at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 3 at position (4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces are actively smelting copper ore into copper plates

### Copper Cable Production Line
Located around position (9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Wooden chest at (6.5, 11.5) storing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5, 11.5) crafting copper cables
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving items from assembler to output
- Storage chest at (12.5, 11.5) containing mixed resources
- Additional storage chests at (14.5, 11.5) and (16.5, 11.5)

### Power Generation System
Located around y-position 24.5, consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5)
- Small electric poles connecting power to the factory

### Research Lab Setup
Located at the bottom of the factory:
- Lab with automation and logistic science packs
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) feeding the lab
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues
- Ensure boiler has constant fuel supply to prevent "out of fuel" warnings
- Steam engine shows "not connected to power network" - verify electrical connections

### Assembly Machine Issues
- Cannot extract items from assembling machine when production hasn't completed
- Ensure required input materials are available before attempting production

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels to prevent "No coal to insert" errors
- Clear blocked items from ground regularly to prevent item buildup

### Production Flow
- Verify chest capacity before attempting to store more items (chest full warnings observed)
- Ensure proper power supply to all electrical components
